record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - April 02, 2008)

[Page: S2365]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:26 p.m., adjourned until Thursday, April 3, 2008, at 9:30 a.m.
